thread.title: Are Kanye West & Rick Rubin Cooking Up Something New?
thread.title_full: Are Kanye West & Rick Rubin Cooking Up Something New?

author: Danielle Harling
title: Are Kanye West & Rick Rubin Cooking Up Something New?
text:
0 
If a screenshot of a text message convo between Rick Rubin and Chicago MC Towkio is any clue, a collab between the Def Jam Records co-founder and Kanye West could be in the works. 
In the apparent exchange between Towkio and Rubin, it was revealed that Rubin played the rapper’s “Swim” record for Kanye and former Vampire Weekend member Rostam Batmanglij. A photo posted by WWW. (@towkio) on Jan 29, 2017 at 4:26pm PST 
The reveal of the convo between the pair has already birthed rumors that ‘Ye could possibly hop on Towkio’s “Swim” track thanks to Rubin, or that he could be collaborating with Rubin (and/or Batmanglij) in some other way. 
Over a year ago, Towkio linked with another Chicago rhymer for his “Clean Up” record. The upbeat video dropped last year and featured a guest appearance from Kanye collaborator Chance The Rapper. 
This latest news about Kanye and Rick Rubin comes shortly after an insider revealed to E! News that the Windy City musician has a “few surprise projects” in the works . 
In regards to his relationship with Kanye, Rubin has worked with the rapper extensively over the past several years. He served as executive producer on Yeezus and ‘Ye’s most recent release, The Life Of Pablo . Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You!
